alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 6:35PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Tooele County through 700 PM MDT... At 635 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Knolls, or 35 miles northwest of Dugway English Village, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clive, Knolls and Utah Test and Training Range South. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 41 and 49. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
